mapper.insert: insert into register (id, RealName, Gender, IDnumber, BirthDate, Age, AgeType, HomeAddress, CaseNumber, VisitDate, Noon, DeptId, UserId, RegistId, SettleID, IsBook, RegisterTime, RegisterID, VisitState, patientID) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{homeaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{casenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{noon,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isbook,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registertime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patientid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update register set RealName = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IDnumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BirthDate = #{birthdate,jdbcType=DATE}, Age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AgeType = #{agetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HomeAddress = #{homeaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CaseNumber = #{casenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VisitDate = #{visitdate,jdbcType=DATE}, Noon = #{noon,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DeptId = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RegistId = #{registid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SettleID = #{settleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IsBook = #{isbook,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RegisterTime = #{registertime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RegisterID = #{registerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VisitState = #{visitstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patientID = #{patientid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, RealName, Gender, IDnumber, BirthDate, Age, AgeType, HomeAddress, CaseNumber, VisitDate, Noon, DeptId, UserId, RegistId, SettleID, IsBook, RegisterTime, RegisterID, VisitState, patientID from register where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, RealName, Gender, IDnumber, BirthDate, Age, AgeType, HomeAddress, CaseNumber, VisitDate, Noon, DeptId, UserId, RegistId, SettleID, IsBook, RegisterTime, RegisterID, VisitState, patientID from register

select id, RealName, Gender, IDnumber, BirthDate, Age, AgeType, HomeAddress, CaseNumber, VisitDate, Noon, DeptId, UserId, RegistId, SettleID, IsBook, RegisterTime, RegisterID, VisitState, patientID from register where idnumber = #{idnumber}

select id, RealName, Gender, IDnumber, BirthDate, Age, AgeType, HomeAddress, CaseNumber, VisitDate, Noon, DeptId, UserId, RegistId, SettleID, IsBook, RegisterTime, RegisterID, VisitState, patientID from register where patientid = #{patientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
